title: Different Action Exercises
introText: Take your time with these calming exercises to build emotional awareness and expand your ability to identify and name feelings with kindness toward yourself.

exercises.title: Identify Emotional Urges
exercises.description: Write down common emotional urges you experience (avoiding, yelling, isolating) and brainstorm different or opposite actions for each one.

exercises.title: Rapid Different Action Practice
exercises.description: Choose one emotional urge to target each day. When the urge arises, immediately act in different or opposite way and note how it feels.

exercises.title: Commitment Phrases
exercises.description: Practice saying commitment phrases like 'I'm stepping in' or 'This is the different action I'm choosing' to reinforce the skill in the moment.

exercises.title: Flash Card Prompts
exercises.description: Create flashcards with emotional urges on one side and their different actions on the other. Use as quick reference tool when emotions arise.

exercises.title: Be Patient With Yourself
exercises.description: The more you patiently practice identifying emotions, the better you'll become at understanding and managing them with compassion.
